tuv.seg: Grants for adapting or equipping the workplace for staff with disabilities
Deontais chun an láthair-oibre a chuir in oiriúint agus a áisiú do fhoireann faoi mhíchumas
Grant assistance is available for employers, employees and self-employed disabled people who need to adapt the workplace or purchase specialised equipment for staff with disabilities

Tá cabhair dheontais le fáil d'fhostóirí, fostaithe agus daoine féinfhostaithe faoi mhíchumas, a dteastaíonn uathu an láthair-oibre a chuir in oiriúint nó trealamh speisialta a cheannach d'fhoireann faoi mhíchumas
This grant is called the Workplace Equipment/Adaptation Grant (WEAG) and you can apply for the grant if the disabled person is already employed or is about to be employed by you
Tugtar Deontas um Oiriúnú Láthair-Oibre ar an deontas seo agus tá sé soláthartha faoin gCiste Freastal Réasúnta na Roinne Coimirce Sóisialaí
Alternatively, if you have a disability, you can apply for the grant yourself if you are already in employment or about to commence employment or self-employment
Ar bhealach eile, má tá tú faoi mhíchumas, is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar dheontas tú féin má tá tú fostaithe cheana nó má tá chun fostaíocht a thosú
Public sector employers (for example, government departments, State agencies, the Health Service Executive, local authorities) are obliged to facilitate the needs of their staff with disabilities

Tá oibleagáid ar fhostóirí san earnáil phoiblí (mar shampla, ranna stáit, gníomhaireachtaí Stáit, Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte, údaráis áitiúla) éascaíocht a dhéanamh do riachtanais a bhfoireann faoi mhíchumas
This means making assistive technology, adaptive equipment and facilities, aids and appliances available
Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcuirtear ar fáil teicneolaíocht chabhrach, trealamh oiriúnaitheach agus saoráidí, áiseanna agus fearais
Public sector employers and their employees with disabilities are therefore not entitled to claim this grant
Dá bharr sin níl fostóirí san earnáil phoiblí ná a bhfostaithe faoi mhíchumas i dteideal an deontais a éileamh leis an láthair-oibre a áisiú nó a chuir in oiriúint dá bhfoireann faoi mhíchumas
(Public sector employers are required to make these services available from their own resources)
(Caithfidh fostóirí seirbhísí poiblí a gcuid foinsí a úsáid chun na seirbhísí seo a chur ar fáil.)
Examples of adaptations for which a grant may be given include:
Tá samplaí de chuid de na hoiriúnuithe lena bhféadfaí deontas a thabhairt áirithe sna nithe seo a leanas:
• Voice synthesisers for computers or amplifiers for telephones
• Sinteiseoirí gutha do ríomhairí nó aimplitheoirí do theileafóin
• Alarm systems with flashing lights
• Córais aláraim le soilse gealánacha
• Minor building modifications (ramps or modified toilets)
• Mionathruithe ar fhoirgnimh (áirítear tógáil nó méadú ar rampa nó mionathruithe ar áiseanna leithris) • Tiontaire Braille
A wide range of equipment and adaptations are covered by this grant
Tá réimse leathan trealamh agus oiriúnuithe atá clúdaithe ag an deontas seo
You should be aware, however, that you are not entitled to make an application for grant assistance each year
Ba chóir duit fios a bheith agat, áfach, nach bhfuil tú i dteideal iarratais a dhéanamh ar dheontas cabhrach gach bliain
You also cannot make an application for equipment that was purchased retrospectively
Ní féidir leat ach an oiread iarratas a dhéanamh le haghaidh trealaimh a cheannaíodh go siarghabhálach
The maximum amount of grant aid is €6,350 towards the cost of adapting or purchasing equipment
Is é €6,350 an t-uasdeontas atá ar fáil le trealamh a cheannach nó a chur in oiriúint
This grant can also be used to upgrade adapted equipment that was funded previously
Is féidir an deontas a úsáid freisin chun uasghrádú a dhéanamh ar threalamh a cuireadh in oiriúint cheana agus ar íocadh deontas lena aghaidh roimhe seo
You or your employer can apply for the grant if you are already employed or about to commence employment
Is féidir leatsa nó le d'fhostóir iarratas a dhéanamh má tá tú fostaithe nó chun tosú ar fhostaíocht
You must complete Part 1 (pdf) and Part 2 (pdf) of the Reasonable Accommodation Fund application form which is available online
Caithfidh tú Cuid 1 (pdf) agus Cuid 2 (pdf) den fhoirm iarratais an Chiste Freastal Réasúnta a líonadh atá le fáil ar líne
It is also available from your local employment services office or Intreo centre
Tá siad le fáil i d'oifig seirbhísí fostaíochta áitiúil nó ionad Intreo freisin
You should identify the equipment and/or adaptation required, justifying why it is needed and supply quotations
Ba chóir duit an trealamh agus/nó an t-oiriúnú a theastaíonn a lua chomh maith leis an údar go bhfuil sé riachtanach agus meastacháin ar an gcostas a chur ar fáil
If the equipment or adaptation costs over €700, you are required to obtain 2 price quotations from different suppliers
Má chosnaíonn an trealamh nó oiriúnú níos mó ná €700, beidh ort 2 mheastachán ar na costais a fháil ó sholáthraithe difriúla
If the equipment or adaptation costs over €1,500, then you are required to obtain 3 price quotations from different suppliers
Má chosnaíonn an trealamh nó oiriúnú níos mó ná €1,500 ansin caithfidh tú 3 mheastachán ar na costais a fháil ó 3 sholáthraí dhifriúil
When your completed application form and quotations are received, your application will be reviewed
Nuair a bhíonn d'fhoirm iarratais líonta agus na meastacháin faighte, déanfar athbhreithniú ar d'iarratas
The equipment or adaptation that is selected will be the most appropriate for you (and may not necessarily be the lowest quote)
Is é an trealamh nó oiriúnú is cuí duitse an ceann a roghnófar (agus d'fhéadfadh sé nach é an meastachán is ísle a bheadh ann)
The grant is then paid directly to the applicant to cover the agreed costs
Íocfar an deontas go díreach ansin leis an iarrthóir chun na costais a chlúdach

If you are a public sector employee and require or will require adaptive or assistive technology or changes to your workplace, you should get in touch directly with the Disability Liaison Officer in your Human Resources Unit

Más oibrí san earnáil phoiblí tú agus go dteastaíonn nó go dteastódh teicneolaíocht chabhrach nó oiriúnach nó athruithe ar do láthair-oibre uait, ba chóir duit teagmháil dhíreach a dhéanamh leis an Oifigeach Idirchaidreamh Míchumas i d’Aonad Acmhainní Daonna
Completed applications for a workplace equipment or adaptation grant should be sent to your local employment services office or Intreo centre
Caithfidh tú foirmeacha iarratais maidir le deontas trealamh nó oiriúnú láthair oibre chomhlánaithe a sheoladh chuig d'oifig seirbhísí fostaíochta áitiúil nó ionad Intreo
A copy of the receipt for the item or adaptation should also be enclosed with your application
Ba chóir duit cóip den fháltas rud nó oiriúnaithe a bheith iniata le d'iarratas
